comments.body: Since we decided to not process unmerged PRs do we really uses `timestamp` for anything? If not please remove it, it just complicates the logic here and there.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+package standard.searchScope
+
+import java.time.Instant
+
+case class SearchScope(start: Int, end: Int, timestamp: Instant = Instant.now()) {
